Bash(PGPASSWORD='selfology_secure_2024' docker exec selfology-postgres psql -U selfology_user -d selfology -c "SELECT id, personality_traits->''big_five'' as big_five FROM selfology.answer_analysis ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;")
